dlgAnsw.text: “How do you like the big city so far?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “I like it just fine,” says Livia with a happy smile. “There is so much to do and see here, I don’t even know where to start.”

dlgAnsw.text: “How are you getting along with Levir?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “Levir? Compared to some of the men I had to work with, he’s a sweetheart. He has quite a little empire here, doesn’t he? You know what it needs? A woman’s touch.”
“I wouldn’t say no to that,” laughs Livia, “but that’s not what I’m getting at. Look around! Don’t you see that it can be so much more?”

dlgAnsw.text: “What do you expect? They don’t call it the Slums for nothing.”

dlgPart.npc_text: “Not that! I mean, it’s very ... unorganized, don’t you see that?”

dlgAnsw.text: “Levir keeps everyone in check but he doesn't really govern the Slums. Not the way he should.”

dlgPart.npc_text:
“Ever been in a whorehouse? A good one is run like clockwork. Trust me, I’d know.
“I was born in The Lusty Nymph in Asmara. I worked the tables when I was young. Worked clients too – they pay top coins for innocent young things and I played that role well. My real gift though wasn’t the ‘theater’, as the Mistress called my little acting, it, but the numbers. I could do things other girls couldn’t.”

“Exactly! It is as if he doesn't care and maybe he shouldn't as he's busy with all kinds of thing, but someone should run the day-to-day operations. Organize everything. You've ever been in a whorehouse? A good one is run like clockwork. Trust me, I’d know.
“I was born in The Lusty Nymph in Asmara. I worked the tables when I was young. Worked clients too – they pay top coins for innocent young things and I played that role well. My real gift though wasn’t the ‘theater’, as the Mistress called my little acting, it, but the numbers. I could do things other girls couldn’t.”

“No, I mean it. I started helping the Mistress with the ledgers and she taught me how to run a whorehouse. Not right away, of course. It took years but in the end I was doing most of the work there. The Mistress was talking about opening up another place. You know, better district, better girls, better clients. She said that I would run it. She really trusted me, you know.”
“The old Lord died and his sons tore the city apart. I was lucky to get out before the siege. I came to Teron and, well, you know the rest.”

dlgAnsw.text: “So you want to start your own brothel here?”
[perception success]“So you want to be the Mistress of the Slums? Manage it for Levir?”

dlgPart.npc_text: “Why not?” grins Livia. “Gotta think big, no?”

“I told him that I'm good with numbers. He asked me some money lending questions, easy ones at first, then really hard ones. I told him that I've never had to lend any money and he said that he wants me to learn all that first.”
